name: Cow Meats Man
description:
A game made for the LiU Fall Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours. 

Made by:  Georgos Fyssas, Jakob Söderstörm, Nils Folker, Philip Gleisner, Mattias Jenvald, Jonas Hallin, Fredrik Ölhen 

Controls:

move with WASD
Select a plant with the mouse-wheel
Right-click to place a plant 
Left-click to water the plants
Press space to reload the game after the victory or defeat screen. 

How to play:

Your goal is to make 2k dollars to save your soul from the angry Italian chef trying to kill you. To do this you will need distractions, obstacles, and of course...Money plants cause we all know money grows in bushes.  Try to avoid the Chef, place meat plants to distract him, make obstacles with vines, and plant dollar plants to earn money. Each dollar plant gives you 200 dollars when it reaches its max stage. The plants need water but luckily for you...You are a cow so you can use your milk. To resupply your milk you can eat grass by standing over a grass tile for a few seconds. That's it, good luck not turning into beef. 

Notes/known problems:

1) The last milk icon for your milk bar doesn't disappear so will display that you have one charge left when in reality you have used up all your milk and need to resupply with grass.

2) Moving diagonally is quicker.

3) The hitbox to water the plant is on its tile and not the plant itself (placing your cursor under the plant, where its "roots" would be should do the trick. 

Final notes:

Thank you LiU Gamejam and Lithekod for organizing this amazing game jam, thank you, everyone, that tested it after the reveal!
